title: 现在买PC正版还送WIN10激活码吗？
author: 圣魔丶狂灵

replies.author: lrf8643
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-35291-1-1.html
去吧。win10是随PC赠送的。
本帖用于审核和记录论坛中购买了PC/Mac正版Minecraft，以及由于购买了PC/Mac正版而获赠Windows 10版的用户。

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
Since you already own the PC/Mac version of Minecraft you have received Minecraft: Windows 10 Edition for free. If you haven't already claimed your gift code, click the "Redeem" button below then follow the instructions.

肯定会一直送下去的
【现在还送

因为都买了PC 谁会去在买个win10 肯定会送的

【如果大改也许以后不送了
